dialogue.text: Niimi tries fruitlessly to drag the bass drum from their drum kit (which is about as tall as they are) into the van.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: Niimi, do you need help with that?

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: No, no, I think I got it.

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: You very clearly do not got it.

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: ...I was lying, my task is Sisyphean in nature and I will die doing it.

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: That's-- ok so that means you need help?
